name: Shotgun
overview: Twilight approaches, and the foxes tummies are rumbling. The sweet smell of free range corn fed chickens wafts gently on the evening breeze, stirring foxy minds to thoughts of pillage and supper. You are the gamekeeper of the infamous Lord Chatterly, and your task, in spare moments, is to protect his chickens. For every fox you kill, he gives you a small bonus, but if too many chickens get eaten, you are likely to lose your job, or even your life! Keys: UP/DOWN CURSOR KEY = DOWN LEFT/RIGHT CURSOR KEY = UP SPACE BAR FIRE TO LOAD HOLD DOWN SHIFT and press RUN/STOP.
